name: Resident Evil: Launch (itch)
description:
New Video!
Thanks to rabidronny for making this awesome video! Sending him DLC!

Launch 2 Announcement! Finally I can announce Launch 2! I had to make this 5x times. Don't ask why... just don't. Estimated release dates:

Current Work:
10% DONE

1-1: 5-8 minutes DONE
1-2: 10-20 minutes DONE
2-1: WIP

Windows: 21st February
Mac OS X: Unknown(If it will be, it will be untested by me.)
Android: 23rd February

LAUNCH 2: JOHN'S ADVENTURE DEMO HERE

200 Downloads: Thanks to every person that decided to download this game! I am preparing much better game this time!

Cheats: I created DLC to add cheats! Click HERE

Youtube Video: Definitely, I have to say thanks!
ashlinski did video on my game! Thank you! Going to send free DLC.
Video here!

Future: See our blog, or patreon! I started developing new game! More info HERE!

Anyway, did somebody found that secret? Don't forget for finding secret you will get DLC Bigger Problems for free!(Hint: Actually hint I am going to give you is how to find ingame hint. Once you will get out of laboratory there is sign.

New DLC! I want to know type of DLC you want next. Take one minute to vote for next DLC! HERE

DLCs! I already started working on DLC about George Johnson! In this DLC you will play non-story(lots of fights) mission. It will add new gun you will enjoy!

Bigger Problems DLC HERE

CLICK HERE FOR BLOG!

CLICK HERE FOR TICKET SYSTEM!

Features:

RPG system: Level up by killing monsters like zombies, lickers, bosses etc.

Explore: Explore world. Find better guns, money, food, water etc.

Shop system: Buy, sell things like guns, herbs...

Main characters: You don't control only one character. You will control more of them!

Controller support: Connect your controller and start playing! so far tested with X360 controller and works brilliant.(not in prototype version will be in full version

Game modes: Unlock different game modes. Campaign, Mercenaries, Bonus Campaign and more!
